alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 11:49AM MST until December 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3000 feet. Periods of moderate to heavy snow will continue to impact the Whitebird Hill. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Whitebird Hill, and Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
